name: publication_status
description: The publication status (visibility) of the entry.

name: publication_date
description: The date on which the entry was first made public.

name: creation_date
description: The date on which the entry was first created.

name: certifications
description: Publicly available evidence of certification or validation through a recognized process or community group. Examples include B-Corp certification, participation in the Global Sustainability Coalition for Open Science Services (SCOSS), CoreTrustSeal certification, or inclusion in the Digital Public Goods registry.

name: standards
description: Standards adhered to in technology and content delivery, such as metadata standards (JATS XML, Dublin Core, Resource Description Framework), serialization (OAI-PMH), information security (ISO/IEC 27001), persistent identifiers (ORCID, ROR, DOIs).
Notes and change descriptions: Eliminate this question and replace with a series of questions on metadata standards, information exchange standards, general web standards

name: registered_service_provider_description
description: Narrative description of registered service provider(s)

name: comparable_tools
description: Services that could be considered peers or competitors.

name: approval_status
description: Status of the submission in the approval workflow.

name: first_name
description: First name of the individual completing the form (and key contact for IOI).

name: last_name
description: Last name of the individual completing the form (and key contact for IOI).

name: email
description: Email address of the individual completing the form (and key contact for IOI).

name: confirmation
description: Indication from the submitter that they understand terms and conditions of submitting the form.

name: membership_numbers
description: Number of organizations and/or individuals actively participating in the membership or sponsorship program

name: ror_id
description: Identifier from Research Organization Registry ID (https://ror.org/).

name: board_structure
description: Structure of the service's governing board.

name: community_governance_status
description: Public documentation of a community-driven governance structure, including evidence of community representation in governing bodies.

name: technology_readiness
description: The service’s readiness for broad adoption, adapted from the framework developed by the Horizon 2020 project.

name: key_technologies
description: The service or tool's technical dependencies.
Notes and change descriptions: Drop this question or make clear the distinction between this and the key technologies question

name: board_members
description: Link to a list of the organization's current board members.
Notes and change descriptions: Request information on individual board members.

name: local_currency
description: Indication of the currency used to report financial information.
Notes and change descriptions: Add a controlled list of global currencies so respondents can indicate the currency of their financial calculations

name: financial_date
be_label: Fiscal year or financial reporting period
description: The specific period for which financial information is being reported, formatted as "MM-YYYY to MM-YYYY"

name: annual_expenses
description: The amount of money that the organization spent on its programs, administration, fundraising, and other activities during the year. For US-based organizations, Part IX, line 25 from an IRS Form 990.
Notes and change descriptions: Revise from USD to local currency, change variable type to integer

name: annual_revenue
description: The amount of money that the organization received from all sources during the most recent complete fiscal year, such as contributions, grants, program service fees, investment income, etc. For US-nased non-profits, Part VIII, line 12 from an IRS Form 990.
Notes and change descriptions: Revise from USD to local currency, change variable type to integer

name: investment_income
description: The amount of money that the organization received from interest, dividends, rents, royalties, and gains or losses from the sale of investments during the year. For US-based non-profits, Part VIII, lines 3, 4, and 7d from an IRS Form 990.
Notes and change descriptions: Revise from USD to local currency, change variable type to integer

name: other_revenue
description: The amount of money that the organization received from other sources not included in the above categories during the year. For US-based non-profits, Part VIII, lines 5, 6d, 8c, 9c, 10c, and 11e from an IRS Form 990.
Notes and change descriptions: Revise from USD to local currency, change variable type to integer

name: program_revenue
description: The amount of money that the organization received from charging fees or selling goods or services related to its mission or programs during the year. For US-based non-profits, Part VIII, line 2g from an IRS Form 990.
Notes and change descriptions: Revise from USD to local currency, change variable type to integer

name: total_contributions
description: The amount of money that the organization received from donors and grantmakers during the year. For US-based non-profits, Part VIII, line 1h from an IRS Form 990.
Notes and change descriptions: Revise from USD to local currency, change variable type to integer

name: total_liabilities
description: The amount of money that the organization owes to others at the end of the year, such as loans, mortgages, accounts payable, deferred revenue, etc. For US-based non-profits, Part X, line 26 from an IRS Form 990.
Notes and change descriptions: Revise from USD to local currency, change variable type to integer

name: financial_visibility
description: Indication of whether the respondent gives permission for financial numbers to be published.

name: staffing_volunteer
description: The current number of full-time equivalent (FTE) uncompensated volunteers whose work serves an essential business function.

name: financial_reporting_level
description: Indication of whether financial information provides to the service or tool itself or to its fiscal sponsor or host organization.
Notes and change descriptions: The tool or service ; The service provider ; Both ; Other

name: financial_documentation
description: Link to publicly or privately available documentation that validates the financial numbers reported. Examples include annual reports or IRS Form 990 for US-based non-profits.
Notes and change descriptions: Provide a link to public documents that validate the financial information provided (e.g., IRS Form 1099 for US-based non-profits)

name: affiliations
description: List of any external partners or organizations directly involved in running or governing the service.

name: founders
description: Organizations and/or individuals that had a direct role in founding or launching the service.

name: grants_list
be_label: List grants received in the past year
description: List of grants received in the past year, including award title; date (start, end dates); funder; amount; grant activities (research and development, operations, strategy/governance/business planning, other); link to award or award announcement, if available.

name: granting_institutions
description: List or organizations that have provided the greatest amount of grant funds to the service or provider in the past year.

name: web_accessibility_applicability
description: Indication of whether the web accessibility statement applies solely to a service or provider's website or to the tool itself.

name: provider_name
description: Name of the service provider. A provider is a formal or informal organization responsible for running a service. In some cases, the provider may be the same as the service.

name: service_name
description: Name of the service. A service is a product or infrastructure component. In some cases, the service may be the same as the provider.

name: location
description: Location of incorporation of the service provider or of primary activity.

name: website
description: Primary web presence of the service.

name: public_contact
description: Contact form or email address potential adopters can use to get additional information.

name: service_logo
description: Logo or other image representing the service.

name: transparent_pricing_url
description: Public link to prices or fees.

name: launch_date
description: Year that the service was first made available to users.

name: last_update
description: Automatically generated date when information in the entry was last changed.

name: solution_category
description: The function(s) the service is primarily designed to serve or how adopters primarily use the service.

name: service_summary
description: Narrative description of the service.

name: key_achievements
description: Narrative description of up to three recent milestones or achievements that demonstrate growth or progress, such as usage or adoption milestones, deployment of major features or new versions, staff additions or changes in leadership.

name: mission
description: Mission statement or description of problems the service aims to solve.

name: code_license_name
description: Type of code license attached to the tool's primary source code repository.

name: saas_options
description: Indication of whether the software can be hosted, deployed, configured, maintained, or otherwise serviced by a vendor, whether the service provider or a third party.

name: maintenance_status
description: The service's maintenance status. Evidence of active maintenance may include regular commits and issue resolutions in a GitHub repository, activity in community and support forums.

name: programming_language
description: Primary programming languages or languages used in the service's source code.
Notes and change descriptions: Label changed from "Key technologies involved in service delivery"; change controlled list from Key_tech

name: metadata_standards
be_label: Metadata, markup, and information exchange standards
description: List of standards and protocols for metadata description and exchange that the tool or service supports.
Notes and change descriptions: Add question

name: pids
description: List of persistent identifiers supported by the tool or service.
Notes and change descriptions: Add question

name: authentication
description: Authentication protocols supported by the tool or service.
Notes and change descriptions: Add question

name: security_standards
description: Information technology security standards in active use by the service.

name: preservation_standards
description: Preservation standards supported or used by the service.

name: metrics_standards
description: Standards supported or used by the service that pertain to the collection of usage or other metrics.

name: content_licensing
description: For services that publish content, a list of licenses used, required, or supported by the platform.
Notes and change descriptions: Make this a controlled vocabulary

name: integrations
fe_label: What other tools and projects does your project interact or integrate with?
description: List of tools and services with which the tool can readily exchange information unidirectionally or bidirectionally.
Notes and change descriptions: Changed field label from "What other tools and projects does your project interact with?" Changed to controlled list instead of free text.

name: registered_service_providers
description: Link to a public registry of approved third party service providers or to a description of services available.
Notes and change descriptions: Change field label from "What registered or community-approved service providers exist for this project?", change input to URL

name: code_license_status
description: Indication of whether the service applies a standard open software license to its primary source code.

name: code_license_url
description: Link to the code license attached to the tool's primary source code repository.

name: open_code_repository_status
description: A public repository where the source code of the service is stored and shared openly, allowing anyone to access, inspect, modify, or contribute to it.

name: open_code_repository_url
description: Public link to code repository.

name: api_status
description: Public availability of application programming interfaces (APIs) that provides developers with programmatic access to content and/or metadata.

name: api_url
be_label: Link to open APIs and/or API documentation
description: Link to public APIs.

name: open_data_statement_status
description: Public statement describing the service's commitment to the use and availability of their data, allowing the data to be accessed to the extent possible

name: open_data_statement_url
description: Public link to open data statement.

name: product_roadmap_status
description: Publicly available documentation outlining the priorities and progress for product development.

name: product_roadmap_url
description: Link to public product roadmap.

name: technical_user_documentation_status
description: Public documentation that meaningfully describes the process users to install, configure, maintain, and troubleshoot the code for running the service. OR, in the case of those services not reliant on client installs, documentation that meaningfully describes how users perform tasks on the platform to utilise the service.

name: technical_user_documentation_url
description: Public link to technical user documentation.

name: contribution_opportunities
description: Inventory of ways in which users can meaningfully contribute to the development or delivery of the service.

name: values_frameworks
description: Publicly available documentation of engagement or self-evaluation using community-developed values assessments. These might include Principles of Open Scholarly Infrastructure (POSI), FOREST Framework, TRUST Principles for Digital Repositories.
Notes and change descriptions: Change to controlled vocabulary; If we change to a controlled vocabulary we lose the option to provide documentation links. If we feel we need documentation of engagement, we'll need to add a separate question.

name: scoss
description: Participation in the Global Sustainability Coalition for Open Science Services (SCOSS).

name: membership_program_url
description: Public link to a list of current members and/or information about membership

name: code_of_conduct_status
description: A public document describing the expectations, norms, rules, and responsibilities for individuals participating in physical and digital communities. It should also provide explicit pathways for reporting violations and indicate how reports will be addressed and resolved.

name: code_of_conduct_url
description: Link to the public code of conduct and reporting guidelines.

name: community_engagement_status
description: Public stated interest in and evidence of available resources for engaging with the service's stakeholder community in a meaningful way. This may include staff explicitly tasked with community engagement, evidence of regular community involvement in major decisions, and community-driven governance.

name: community_engagement_activities
description: Inventory of community engagement activities the service or provider currently employs.
Notes and change descriptions: Require and change to controlled vocabulary

name: community_engagement_url
description: Link to public information about community engagement activities.

name: contribution_pathways
description: Implementation status of publicly advertised ways for users meaningfully contribute to the development or delivery of the service.

name: contribution_guidelines
description: Link to publicly available documentation of the ways in which users can meaningfully contribute to the development or delivery of the service.

name: board_level
description: Indication of whether the governing body is affiliated with the provider or the service.

name: governance_summary
description: Description of the governance structure of the service, including major partners or sponsors and existence of governing boards and committees.

name: community_governance_url
be_label: Link to bylaws or other governance documentation
description: Public documentation of bylaws or other governance rules.

name: commitment_to_equity_status
description: Public statement on diversity, equity, and inclusion and documentation of clear initiatives, programs, or other activities aimed at measuring and increasing the diversity of their users, community members, and other key stakeholders.
Notes and change descriptions: Do we want to exclude equal opportunity or non-discrimination in hiring practices here? We got a lot of these and I don't think that's exactly what we were looking for.

name: commitment_to_equity_url
be_label: Link to diversity, equity, inclusion, and antiracism statement or policy
description: Public link to statement and/or evidence of activities supporting diversity, equity, and inclusion.

name: governance_records_status
description: Indication of whether the service maintains public governance records, including board meeting minutes, records of major decisions, elections, or other indications of an active governance process.
Notes and change descriptions: Change label to "governance records" (instead of governance activities) make more clear that this question is asking about whether board meeting minutes and other documentation are made available.

name: governance_records_url
description: Public link to governance records, including board meeting minutes, records of major decisions, elections, or other indications of an active governance process.
Notes and change descriptions: Change label to "governance records" (instead of governance activities) make more clear that this question is asking about whether board meeting minutes and other documentation are made available.

name: governance_structure_status
description: Availability of a public description of how the service is organized and managed, such as the roles, responsibilities, decision-making, and communication mechanisms of the stakeholders.

name: governance_structure_url
be_label: Link to governance structure and processes
description: Public description of how the service is organized and managed, such as the roles, responsibilities, decision-making, and communication mechanisms of the stakeholders.

name: transparent_pricing_status
description: For services that charge a fee for service or use, public documentation of prices and fees in a way that allows users to meaningfully evaluate the costs associated with using their service.
Notes and change descriptions: Change controlled vocabulary from Impl_scale to Impl_scale_pricing

name: commitment_to_privacy_status
description: The service maintains a public policy or policies regarding the collection and use of user data or personal information. Privacy policies should indicate whether personal information is ever sold, how users can opt out of data collection, and how the service complies with applicable laws (e.g., GDPR).

name: commitment_to_privacy_url
description: Public link to privacy policy.

name: web_accessibility_status
description: Public statement describing the organization’s commitment and actions to making their sites accessible to all users regardless of their abilities.

name: web_accessibility_url
description: Public link to web accessibility statement.

name: business_form
description: The service's legal business structure or formal aims.
Notes and change descriptions: Add "intergovernmental organization" to list of options

name: nonprofit_status
description: Specific non-profit designation or status in the country of incorporation

name: organizational_history
description: Brief brief narrative overview of the history of the service and/or provider or a link to a public document.

name: staffing_full_time
description: The current number of full-time equivalent (FTE) compensated employees.

name: primary_funding_source
description: Indication of whether the service is primarily funded through program service revenue or contributions.

name: shareholders
description: Indication of whether any person, company, or institution owns at least one share of a service provider's stock

name: funding_needs
description: Description of ways in which investment can help the service achieve its goals.

name: total_assets
description: The value of everything that the organization owns at the end of the year, such as cash, investments, property, equipment, etc. For US-based non-profits, Part X, line 16 from an IRS Form 990.
